markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Greater Mental Evolution](/Feats.aspx?ID=626) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 201 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Arcane Evolution](/Feats.aspx?ID=609) or [Occult Evolution](/Feats.aspx?ID=612)

</column>

---

Your bloodline’s deep connection to mental essence greatly enhances your spell repertoire. Add one spell to your spell repertoire for each spell level you can cast.
name: Greater Mental Evolution
